title: France panorama. [No. 73/07]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Pleasure-boating - the Paris Pleasure-Boating Salon. Modern teaching methods - the Gagny Audio-Visual School. 2. Autoroutes - the Thruway network in France. 3. The arts: Yvaral - the paintings of Yvaral. The Marseille Ballet - Maia Plissetskaia from the Bolchoi dances with the Roland Petit Troupe.
